price: (128) Do you construct on every elevation a sign,[1055] amusing yourselves,
footnotes: [1055]- i.e., a symbol or indication of their wealth and power.  They used to build lofty structures along the road to be seen by all who passed by.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)
